CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1961, page A12 reads: "Dancing Duo - Mike Malone and his dancing partner, Yvonnee Jones Kemp, stop the show each time they appeared. Both are offspring of the Junior Mothers. He is the son of Norma Malone, and she is the daughter of Kay Jones." Headline for images reads: "Over 500 Attend Junior Mother's... 'Smart Affairs of 1961'"
TitMainTitle: Mike Malone and Yvonne Jones Kemp wearing dance costumes and holding hats, posing with bent legs in interior with leaf patterned carpet and marble baseboards, during the Junior Mothers' "Smart Affairs of 1961"
